original_text: God has called you out of your troubles, Job. He wants you to live in a safe place where you have no problems. He wants you to have a comfortable life with plenty of good food to eat. God has called you out of your troubles, Job.
korean_text: 그러므로 하나님이 그대를 환난에서 이끌어 내사 좁지 않고 넉넉한 곳으로 옮기려 하셨은즉 무릇 그대의 상에는 기름진 것이 놓이리라

sentences.original_text: God has called you out of your troubles, Job.
He wants you to live in a safe place
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 안전한 곳에 살기를 원하십니다.

sentences.original_text: He wants you to have a comfortable life
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 편안한 삶을 갖기를 원하십니다.

sentences.original_text: with plenty of good food to eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 먹을 좋은 음식이 풍부하게 있는 삶입니다.

sentences.original_text: God has called you out of your troubles, Job.
